backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining chatroom and messaging system with types (Message, Chatroom, UserProfile, Reaction), CRUD operations for chatrooms/messages, access control integration, blob storage mixin, active user tracking, and admin-only deletion with password protection.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features: automatic URL detection with clickable links, external link warning dialog, trusted domain bypass for embeds, and two share link fixes for scrolling and highlighting target messages.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend components including routing, React Query hooks, chat UI components (Header, ChatArea, MessageBubble, MessageInput), profile setup, styling with OKLCH colors and iOS-specific fixes, and lobby page with search/filtering.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tags for mobile, cache-busting directives, and versioned script tag (v=203) to force production refresh.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup defining lobby, chatroom (with messageId search param), and admin routes, plus conditional header/footer rendering that hides both on admin pages.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for avatar selection supporting file upload, Giphy search with debouncing and trending GIFs, avatar removal, and request ID tracking to prevent race conditions in async Giphy fetches.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface component that displays messages, handles scrolling, message filtering (hides Creator messages without media), reply context, message highlighting, and integrates MessageBubble, MessageInput, and PinnedVideo components.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom preview card with thumbnail support for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing metadata like message count, viewer count, and timestamp with platform-specific badges.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Modal dialog for creating new chatrooms with support for uploading images, embedding YouTube/Twitch videos, or Twitter posts, including category selection and media validation.
frontend/src/components/ExternalLinkDial: Confirmation dialog that warns users before navigating to external URLs, displaying the destination and providing continue/cancel options.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with logo, username editing functionality (alphanumeric validation, 15 char limit), avatar picker integration, and back-to-lobby navigation for chatroom views.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, with comments explicitly stating authentication must not be introduced to keep the app anonymous.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Individual message display component with support for text, images, YouTube/Twitch/Twitter embeds, voice messages, reactions, pinning, replies, link detection, and external link warnings for untrusted domains.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message input component with support for text, images, GIFs (via Giphy), voice recording, and auto-detection of YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs. Includes file upload with progress tracking, emoji support, and character limit validation.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned video (YouTube or Twitch) with an unpin button. Renders embedded iframes for supported video platforms using extracted video IDs and embed URLs.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component for voice messages with play/pause controls, waveform visualization, progress slider, and time display. Handles playback synchronization to pause other audio when playing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that debounces a value by delaying updates until after a specified delay period has elapsed without changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Hook that ensures chatrooms are freshly fetched when the actor becomes ready by purging stale cache entries (especially empty arrays) and forcing a refetch. Exposes recovery state for loading indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication using @dfinity/auth-client. Manages login/logout flow, identity persistence, and provides authentication status throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for chatroom and message operations (CRUD, search, reactions, user profiles) with caching, polling, and localStorage-based user identity management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, mobile viewport fixes, and custom styling for voice message range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports Giphy API configuration constants (API key and result limit).
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides a utility function to format numbers with compact notation (k, M, B).
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Implements Giphy API integration for searching and fetching trending GIFs with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for dynamic html2canvas library loading.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images using canvas while preserving orientation and quality.
frontend/src/lib/linkDetection.ts: Detects URLs in text using regex and returns an array of text and link segments for rendering.
frontend/src/lib/trustedDomains.ts: Validates if a URL belongs to trusted domains (Twitter/X, YouTube, Twitch) for safe embedding.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts preview fields (author, text, image) with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching logic.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail/embed URLs for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter/X platforms, including pattern matching for various URL formats.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for managing and deleting chatrooms, protected by password authentication stored in session storage, with filtering and sorting capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Page component that loads a specific chatroom by ID, handles view count incrementing, and renders the ChatArea with optional targetMessageId from query params for message highlighting.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page displaying all chatrooms with search, category filtering, and algorithmic sorting (live rooms first, then by view count and creation date), plus create chatroom dialog.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme properties, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document listing existing features for URL detection, disclaimer warnings, trusted embed handling, and pending fixes for share link scroll-to and highlight functionality.
